name: Rolli and the 6 Dimensions
description:
Hello!  We've created a game called "Rolli and the 6 Dimensions".

The controls are:

left/right to roll.

mouse controls to place and move platform.

escape to exit platform building.

the 2 above are performed when the player is on the blue pad.

escape to go to pause menu.

We had a lot of fun making this game, and we hope you'll have just as much fun playing it!

Credits

  • Music by Abstraction
  • UI Sounds by Kenney
